page.title: 12WINTERSLOW PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: WINTERSLOW PRIMARY SCHOOL IS AIDED BY THE CHURCH OF ENGLAND,IT HAS 6 CLASSES WITH AN AGE RANGE 5-11. THERE IS 192 CHILDREN IN THE SCHOOL. THERE IS A SCHOOL HOUSE WHICH STORES PAPER AND COSTUMES.ALSO WE HAVE 2 MOBILES WHICH CLASSES 4 AND 5 USE. SCHOOL STARTS AT 9.00AM AND THE REGISTER IS TAKEN. ON MONDAYS WE WORK FOR 1 AND A HALF HOURS AND THEN HAVE ASSEMBLY.THE OTHER MORNINGS ASSEMBLY IS FIRST. AT 12.00 WE HAVE LUNCH YOU EITHER HAVE SANDWICHES OR DINNERS WHICH COST 62p PER DAY. DURING LUNCH TIME WE CAN JOIN CLUBS. ON WEDNESDAY AFTERNOONS WE HAVE CRAFT WHERE WE DO WOODWORK,MODEL MAKING,PAINTING AND SEWING. SCHOOL FINISHES AT 3.00PM.
